page.title: 16Tourism in Berrynarbor area
page.content: This is a very popular holiday area.The main height of the season is during July and August.There are flats and cottages on the farms and in the village which are let to holiday makers during the summer months and sometimes in the winter months to local people who need a home..perhaps while they are buying a house. In Berrynarbor village there are samll hotels and also guest houses offer Bed and Breakfast. Berrynarbor village is much busier during the summer months. Holiday visitors like the old fashioned character and attractive appearance. They visit the 300year old pub the tea rooms for a special Devon Cream Tea or just enjoy a walk around the very attractive village. There is a camp site in the Sterridge Valley for static caravans and tourists tents.Campers shop in the village.
